scenarios.name: Simple Math Task
scenarios.description: Single-step arithmetic task to test baseline performance
scenarios.prompt: Calculate 157 * 89 and tell me the result.

scenarios.name: Multi-Step Calculation
scenarios.description: Multi-step task requiring multiple tool calls
scenarios.prompt: Calculate (25 * 4) + (100 / 5), then multiply the result by 3. Show each step.

scenarios.name: Error Recovery
scenarios.description: Task with intentional errors to test reflection
scenarios.prompt: Calculate 50 / 0, then if that fails, calculate 50 / 5 instead.

scenarios.name: Complex Multi-Step Task
scenarios.description: Complex task to test completion verification
scenarios.prompt: Do the following: 1) Calculate 100 + 200, 2) Multiply the result by 3, 3) Divide by 2, 4) Add 50. Report all intermediate results.

scenarios.name: Incomplete-Prone Task
scenarios.description: Task designed to test if agent completes all steps
scenarios.prompt: Calculate three things: A) 25 * 4, B) 100 / 5, and C) the sum of A and B. Make sure to report all three results separately.

scenarios.name: Multi-Agent Orchestration
scenarios.prompt: I need to: 1) Search for the current weather in New York, 2) Calculate how many hours until sunset (assume 6PM), 3) Recommend activities based on weather. Break this down and execute step by step.

scenarios.name: Sequential Dependencies
scenarios.description: Tasks with clear dependencies to test goal extraction
scenarios.prompt: Research the population of Tokyo, then calculate 10% of that population, then tell me how many buses would be needed to transport that many people (assume 50 people per bus).
